posts.title: The Potipharian  Article
posts.body:
Potiphar was chief security officer for Pharaoh in Egypt.

He must have been an intelligent man. A militant man...

He would the intelligence of Egypt at hand...

But how come he believed his wife's story about Joseph.

He did not even investigate the report of his wife....

His wife must have been a woman with considerable impact on the decisions he made. What a woman!

polls.question: Which one would you prefer? React or Vue?
